snippet: Aaron Hill homered, doubled and scored twice as the visiting Arizona Diamondbacks beat the San Francisco Giants, 2-0, on Saturday.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; St Louis Cardinals defeat Milwaukee Brewers, 10-2; other MLB scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Aaron Hill homered, doubled and scored twice as the visiting Arizona Diamondbacks beat the San Francisco Giants, 2-0, on Saturday.

headline.main: Cardinals Tie Grieving Brewers for First; Abreu Powers White Sox Past the Indians
headline.print_headline: Cardinals Tie Grieving Brewers for First; Abreu Powers White Sox Past the Indians
